messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] samurai figuring / statue??
messages.msgSnippet: Blue et al- You might try www.samurai-collectibles.com , I am almost embarrassed to admit I purchased one of their Dolls . I looked at others with better
messages.messageBody:
Blue et al-
You might try www.samurai-collectibles.com , I am almost embarrassed
to
admit I purchased one of their "Dolls". I looked at others with better
articulation but felt these had a better look in the faces and clothing.
The
swords look good from afar but turned out to be pretty cheap.
-t

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] samurai figuring / statue??
messages.msgSnippet: Check eBay.....    there are quite a few dolls available.  Here s a little eye candy for you.  Some are dolls; some are miniatures yoroi and bogu.
messages.messageBody:
Check eBay..... there are quite a few dolls available. Here's a little eye candy for you. Some are dolls; some are miniatures
yoroi and bogu.

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=4003&item=3950928242&rd=1

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=4003&item=3950834769&rd=1

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=4003&item=3950834531&rd=1

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=4003&item=3933312363&rd=1

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=4003&item=3951309258&rd=1

I'm sure you can Google a search for other sources .... helping your self is a great way to learn, now that you've been given a
head start. Have fun!

Lizzie

From: blues_bleu

Sent: Saturday, January 08, 2005 4:41 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] samurai figuring / statue??




hello, i'm new to this forum. so i might need some help from you
experts guys out there in the forum.

i'm wanting to get a figure / statue size about anything around 12"
would be great!

figure or statue of a samurai in full war armour together with their
head gear!!..

Do you think it's possible to get one??

anyone???

thank you very much!!!!

blues_bleu@...
